text: The actress is the latest to exit the cop drama, following co - creator Matt Olmstead and star Jon Seda. Chicago P. D. is saying goodbye to one of its stars. Sophia Bush is departing the NBC cop drama after four seasons. The departure comes after a surprising season finale in which Bush's character, Det. Erin Lindsay, was faced with moving to New York for an undercover assignment with the FBI's counter - terrorism unit in order to protect her troubled mother, Bunny ( Markie Post ), who had become embroiled in a murder investigation. The potential job change also came just as Lindsay's on - and - off boyfriend, Det. Jay Halstead ( Jesse Lee Soffer ), was thinking about proposing.
